name: Inner Light (itch) (Julio Pagani Filho, BrunoLimenzo, Sarah, Andre Traverso)
name_original: Inner Light (itch) (Julio Pagani Filho, BrunoLimenzo, Sarah, Andre Traverso)
description:
This game was made in 48 hours to the GGJ of 2022.

Inner Light is a strategic survival game in which you control Glint, a being made of light whose lonely world is attacked by a mysterious void that is trying to drain their world's light. In order to restore their world, Glint has to tap into the power of the darkness within themselves to fight against their doom.

---------

How to play:

General

Walk -  WASD

Jump - SPACE

Day mode

Left click - Pick and place new blocks

Right click - Destroy placed blocks

Night mode

Left Click - Attack monsters

Right Click - Recover life from white blocks (also destroys it)

---------

Julio Pagani F.: Producer / UI / Game Design

---------

More about the game

The game has two distinct phases determined by the void's activity: dormant or active. During its dormant state, Glint is granted a brief respite, during which they can place platforms made of light and shadow. Their placement is key to surviving the onslaught that will come during the void's active state.

During its active state, the void will drain all the light in the world and concentrate it on itself, hiding some platforms, while leaving others visible. Glint has to survive this state by remembering the position of the hidden platforms to dodge attacks and defeat enemies that are being sent by the void to deplete their Inner Light.

Being the last glint of light that is fighting for their world, once Glint's Inner Light is depleted, the void will succeed in its endeavor.
